field.name: Giving home care for the infant
Counsel Mother to Exclusively Breastfeed the Young Infant
Give only breastfeeds to the baby for the first 6 months
Breastfeed frequently, as often and for as long as the infant wants
Advise Mother to Keep Young Infant Warm at All Times
In cool weather cover the infant’s head and feet
Dress the infant with extra clothing
